name: Mega Ship Parking
description:
Mega Ship Parking is the best ship parking game on store. Game is the sailing procedures any boat captain would get in a real sea grade ship. With 3 really big ships racing to find a spot to park and unload you will have you hands full. Watch the sides, check the corners and keep your eyes open. This game is all about skill, precision and driving and sailing simulation for boat captains and mega ship lovers
Features:
Speed boat extreme driving and parking challenges
Be best captain driver on sea land
Perfect speedy navy ship ride action
Best smooth control with realistic scenes
Real time parking experience on army shipping ride
